subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann, the coach of the U.S. men’s national team, will take 22 players back to Los Angeles for the final stage of training camp.
snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann, the coach of the U.S. men’s national team, will take 22 players back to Los Angeles for the final stage of training camp.
